imu
Class IMU

java.lang.Object
  imu.IMU

public class IMU
extends java.lang.Object

This is the class that links the calibrating program to the IVY bus in order to get the RAW_DATA messages.

Constructor Summary
IMU()
          allows to get back the right RAW_DATA messages
